summary: Makes the player home building materials in Hearthfire weightless, and renames them to make them easier to sort
descriptionHtml:
Makes all of the building materials introduced in the Hearthfire add-on weightless, and renames them to make them easier to sort in the inventory. This is my first mod, so if please feel free to suggest anything else for it, and of course to let me know if it causes any problems. Feel free to combine this mod with another, just let me know and add a link to this one if you do. 

Makes the follow items weightless and renames them for sorting: 
Clay 
Glass 
Goat Horns 
Hinge 
Iron Fittings 
Lock 
Nails 
Quarried Stone 
Straw 

REQUIREMENTS: 
Hearthfire 

COMPATIBILITY: 
Will work with all mods as long as they don\'t affect the same items.

Also available on the Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=127570421&searchtext=
author: kieranwilson32
